about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi! I am Ain Moises Ponce, a full-stack developer passionate about creating innovative and efficient web solutions. With experience in developing modern applications using technologies like React, Node.js, and both relational and non-relational databases, among other technologies.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: I have worked on various projects, from small applications to complex enterprise systems. My focus is on writing clean, maintainable, and scalable code.

approach.title: Approach
approach.description: I specialize in modern web application development, with a strong emphasis on user experience and performance. I'm always learning new technologies and best practices to improve my skills.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Do you have a project in mind? I'd love to hear about it! You can contact me through any of the following means:

location.title: Location
location.description: Currently based in Buenos Aires, Argentina
